description: This Kotlin source file defines mock data models and sample content for the Android TV home screen UI, including data classes for poster items and row data, as well as a singleton object holding sample data used to populate the UI.

classes.name: PosterItem
classes.description: Represents a poster with an ID, title, backdrop resource ID, and description.

classes.name: RowData
classes.description: Encapsulates a row's title and a list of PosterItems for display.

classes.name: MockContent
classes.description: Singleton object containing predefined mock data: two rows of posters, used for the home screen UI.

methods.name: rowTrending
methods.description: A list of PosterItems under the 'Trending Now' section.

methods.name: rowRecommended
methods.description: A list of PosterItems under the 'Recommended for You' section.
